resources.string: Tells you when your monster has encounted an event.

Monster Journey is an app that will track your steps as your device moves. There are various ways to take care of your monster: 
 • Library: Check information on Monsters that you have currently unlocked or discovered.
 • Map: Select the current island to travel on, each island completed will unlock new rewards that help you on your journey.
 • Care: Raise your monster by Training or Feeding it. Also where you Evolve, Retire, or ask the Matchmaker to look for a match for your monster.
 • Ranch: Holds up to 5 monsters for you. You can select a monster there to release or take with you on your journey.
 • Minigame: Play minigames as a way to unlock more steps. Minigames cost Hunger points from your current monster.
 • Connect: Connect with nearby players to battle, match, or play games with.
 • Shop: Spend real world money to buy items that help you on your journey. Or to remove advertisements from the game. 

 App designs, code, and music were made by: Caleb Turcotte 
 
 Special thanks to the following for help with monster designs:
 • Michael Le
 • Kimmie Truong
 • Julia To
Please enter a name for your new Monster:
Thank you for buying the Cosmic egg.
Thank you for buying the Dark egg.
Thank you for buying the Light egg.
You will no longer see advertisements.
Thank you for purchasing this item bundle.
A basic food item. Restores half a heart upon consumption
A food item. Restores a heart upon consumption
A large food item. Restores one and a half a heart upon consumption
Restores one diligence heart upon consumption.
A rare item. Reduces steps needed to evolve by 1000.
Evolve your monster if conditions have been met.
Send your monster off to retirement and start raising a new one.
Are you sure you want to retire your current monster? You will start off with a new egg if you confirm.
Are you sure you want to release this monster? You won\'t be able to get it back if you confirm.
Do you want to select a new egg to add to your party?
Search for a match for your monster!
Connect and battle with another nearby person\'s monster.
Connect with another person\'s monster and create a new egg. (Caution: will retire your current monster if ranch is full, both players must have an adult stage monster.)
Mufufu, looks like you met a friend. Shall we make this a match? (This will retire your current monster if your ranch is full)
I see that you are already searching for a match. Did you want me to keep looking?
Challenge a nearby player to rock paper scissors. The first one to get 3 points wins!
Hello young soul. I am the matchmaker. Once your monster has grown seek me again so I may find it a suitor.
Hello old soul. I am the matchmaker. Bear your heart to me and I shall find you a suitor. Shall I look for a match for your monster?
I come bearing a match. Do you accept this proposition? (This will retire your current monster if your ranch is full)
A memory game where you must select buttons in the same pattern presented. Earn steps for each round you pass.
Move a chain along to collect blocks and become longer. Earn steps for each block you collect.
Please wait at least 10 seconds for search to finish.
A scorching island in a sea of flames. Monsters that live here have learned to adapt to the extreme heat.
An ancient island full of savage terrain. Dino type monsters can be found here.
An island of coral and sea life. Monsters here are accustomed to living in the sea.
A strange land inhabited by Enigma type monsters. Spirits and strange beings can be found here.
An island that has been overrun with foliage. Monsters here have become one with nature.
An island built out of metal. The lack of organic materials has caused it to be full of machines.
An island covered in dark miasma. Monsters on this island have become one with darkness
An island in the clouds surrounded by light. Monsters here are accustomed to the constant daytime.
An island that is said to have once been in the stars. All the monsters here are celestial beings.
This entry hasn\'t been unlocked yet.
A seemingly basic egg. Contains an enigma type monster.
A prehistoric egg. Contains an ancient type monster.
An aquatic egg. Contains an aquatic type monster.
A fiery egg. Contains a fire type monster.
An egg made out of metal. Contains a machine type monster.
An egg that sprouted from the earth. Contains an earth type monster.
An enigma type monster. Although it is actually a spirit, this monster strangely resembles a raccoon. It will spend most of its time hiding and playing in forests.
An enigma type monster. Some believe it eerily resembles a skull but Researchers have found that they appear to be made of a more brittle material, which is why they often hide from strangers.
An enigma type monster. Folklore mentions this monster as a symbol of wealth and prosperity. Because of this they have been hunted to the point where finding one in the wild is a rarity.
An enigma type monster. Commonly found in forests this monster is very social with those it deems friends.
An enigma type monster. A symbol of the desert. This monster spends a lot of time alone so it becomes startled and unpredictable when something new approaches.
The ectoplasm around this skull has given it the power of flight. Groups of this monster float around graveyards hoping to reconnect with lost loved ones.
A friendly ghost. Not many are able to see it without aid. Because of this it feels quite lonely.
This enigma type monster strangely resembles a sphinx. It spends most of its time lounging around in front of caves and passageways. Only allowing passage to whoever can solve its riddles.
Rain will follow this monster wherever it goes. Which is unfortunate since this monster hates getting wet. With stolen leaf and rain jacket it tries its best to stay covered up at all times.
The result of a spirit possessing a discarded stuffed bear. Most will seek revenge to their previous owners but some simply wish to be loved.
A snowman that has come to life. They can cause snowstorms easily when frightened.
Originally used to ward off enemies from farms. One day it suddenly came to life. Since it has no legs its forced to hop around.
Smaller spirits are drawn to this monster. Their spiritual energy joins with the main host supplying it with more power.
An enigma monster with a terrifying appearance. It is actually very friendly and loves the company of others.
An electrical surge created this strange monster. Made up of spiritual energy and electricity it is able to travel immense distances through electrical wiring.
Said to be put together from old parts by a mad scientist. A large bolt of lightning was used to give it life. The lightning granted it immense strength and stamina as well.
An enigma type monster. It can\'t move its main body so it waits and gazes at the passing world.
A dino type monster. Once it bites onto something it never lets go so watch out!
A dino type monster. As a cold and shy baby it hides inside its egg shell so it can remain warm and comfortable.
A dino type monster. It sleeps for 20 hours a day and only wakes up to eat or when bothered.
Said to be an ancestor of the armadillo. This monster relies on its tough shell to protect itself.
Researchers believe that this monster\'s jaws can chew through steel. Other monsters keep their distance from this one.
Its long neck is surprisingly made up of only seven bones. Researchers believe that the long neck helps with the digestion of plants.
With armored plates on its back and spikes on its tail this monster enjoys tests of strength to prove which is the strongest in the herd.
The three horns on its head are used to dig up tough plants so it can eat the roots. A herd of these monsters can clear an entire forest in months.
Thought to be an ancient relative of the sloth, this monster used its large claws to dig into tough bark. In order to keep moving it must eat one ton of food each day.
Covered in scales, this dino type monster protects itself while bludgeoning enemies with its tail.
This monster enjoys spending its time swimming in large lakes. Its long neck can be used to reach above or deep below the water.
A savage monster who prefers to be alone. It is very territorial so if you notice one then keep your distance.
A proud dinosaur with small horns on its forehead. The hard scales on its back keep it close to the top of the food chain.
Researchers believe that the large fin on its back is used for temperature regulation. One can often find two of these monsters fighting over territory or food.
An apex predator in both size and ferocity. Their territory is so huge that most people don\'t even realize that they\'re living in it.
A large and docile dino type monster. It likes to spend its time in large herds with many large trees nearby to snack on.
A dino type monster. A dangerous savage who will attack anything that enters its territory.
An earth type monster. This seemingly simple seed will one day grow up to be a large monster… or at least that\'s what it tells its friends.
An earth type monster. For a long time researchers have wondered if this monster is actually three monsters gathered together or a monster with three heads.
This monster wanders around the forest on its hind legs looking for friends in need. …It just needs to find a friend first…
A garden vegetable that has mysteriously gained sentience. It will guard the garden it came from hoping that other vegetables will someday talk back to it.
A monster that has started to become one with the plant life that surrounds it. Its main hobby is storing nuts in any trees in the area.
Both of this monsters heads work together to help the main body survive. It will migrate long distances to pollinate new areas.
A mysterious monster that hides inside a bush. No one is exactly sure what it looks like or if any two look the same.
A squishy blob that bounces through the forest. The large leaf on its head is used to protect itself from the environment.
A savage vegetable. Known to gobble insects that get too close it will protect its garden at all costs.
A cat that has sprung from the earth. Most of the nutrients it gains are from photosynthesis.
This monster imitates an egg in hopes that someone else will take care of it.
Known for pollinating plant life in the forest it lives in. Some believe this monster is a guardian that brings good luck.
A large beetle that guards the forest. In its spare time it often gives rides to smaller monsters.
The spirit of a tree that has been cut down. It wanders the forest trying to protect other trees from the same fate.
A gentle monster who is one with the forest. The plant life that grows on its head can be used for medicine.
A group of these monsters is known as a troop. The alpha of the troop oversees the others and teaches the young.
An aqua type monster. Born in a small lake it slowly crawls outside to meet new friends.
An aqua type monster. With its many arms it floats around hoping small prey will get stuck in its tentacles.
This aqua type monster is often mistaken by some cultures as a mythical dragon. It is however actually a type of eel.
When threatened this aqua type monster will expand to try and intimidate the threat. It also expands when happy, which is… confusing.
This aqua type monster stores water in a sac on its back. The water combines with mucus on its skin to produce large bubbles.
This aqua type monster hides in a large bubble made of water. It will keep adding water to its bubble and try and replace any water lost on hot days.
Normally found at the bottom of the ocean, this aqua type monster will come up for air every few days to socialize.
This aqua type monster has no bones. Because of this it floats around hoping smaller creatures get caught in its tentacles.
This aqua type monster spends most of its time relaxing on beaches with its herd. The largest one is in charge of keeping a lookout for threats while the others sleep.
Found on beaches it will use its cute appearance to befriend other monsters and join their group.

According to legend, a carp that could swim upstream and then leap the falls of the Yellow River at Dragon Gate would be transformed into a dragon. Researchers have tossed carp through this gate but it appears that unless a carp makes the journey itself it will not transform.
Because of its fearsome appearance this monster likes to hide in the dark depths of the sea. It will use the light at the end of it\'s lure to draw prey closer before it strikes.
This strange monster has no bones. Because of this it is able to hide and squeeze through tight crevasses on the ocean floor.
This monster uses sensors on its body to detect electric signals from passing organisms to hunt its prey.
The shell on this monster is actually made out of iron, which it will collect on the sea floor over its life. All of its feet are covered in tiny iron scales as well for further protection.
A roomba that has been taken over by a cybernetic organism. It forgot the reason it first came to this island so now it spends its time cleaning factory floors.
Despite its tough appearance it relies on other to keep its key winded so that it can move around.
It once was a simple kitchen oven. However one day it mysteriously gained sentience. Now it roams around spewing heat if others get too near.
A mysterious vehicle from space that has been taken over by a cybernetic organism. It soars through the night sky startling unsuspecting tourists.
An armored vehicle that was taken over by a cybernetic organism. It enjoys long patrols and target practice.
This monster can plug itself into electrical sockets to charge and distribute energy. It is popular in factories since it can keep machines running for twice their average lifespan.
A machine type monster that must be rewound each day. Their internal mechanisms allow it to travel long distances without any need for food or water.
A heavy robot used in construction. It spends its life eating tons of scrap metal to have the energy so it can keep moving.
A cybernetic organism that has taken over a blimp. Companies love to have it carry advertisements for them since they can fly for so long.
A large excavator taken over by a cybernetic organism. When it sets its mind to it, it can change entire landscapes enough that local maps must be redrawn.
A robot that slightly resembles a crab. The giant glass dome on its head allows it to look in every direction giving it next to no blind spots.
Built by a mad scientist. This monster can climb on walls and likes to occupy abandoned factories.
This monsters long and sturdy arms help it lift metal beams. It is able to adjust itself as needed for almost any job.
Popular among children. This monster has been programmed to bring joy to families.
A bizarre machine that oddly resembles an owl. It is believed to be part of a top secret project to defend humanity from a mysterious threat in space.
A machine type monster. Originally a simple drilling machine used for construction that has been taken over by an unknown cybernetic organism. Its dream is to drill to the heavens.
A fire type monster. Enjoys sitting around campfires and eating stray embers.
A fire type monster. Some cultures carry totems based on it for good luck and fortune.
This horned monster carries a small fire on its back. This fire is used to regulate its internal temperature.
This fire type monster stores fuel in a sac on its back. The fuel produces strong flames which are expelled constantly.
The shell on its back is actually a miniature volcano. This monster mainly eats stones which are melted in its core to filter out nutrients it can digest.
This ball of fire has obtained sentience through some bizarre accident. Through fear of eventually burning out it will search out smaller flames to consume.
A rare wyrm thought to be a descendant of ancient dragons. Despite having wings it spends most of its time slithering on the ground.
Once a smaller fireball it has managed to consume enough flames that it has become large and complacent.
A mad scientist has combined this monster with a factory. Because of this it now has a large chimney on its back that expels flames from its internal furnace.
In the harsh heat of its environment this monster has been forced to develop fierce instincts to survive.
Indigenous tribes on small islands worship this monster believing it will protect them on fishing trips.
In the extreme heat of the desert this monster can be found. The heat also produces mirages which makes studying it difficult.
Despite its fearsome appearance this monster is quite kind. It will spend most of its time caring for baby monsters. It also guards them so be careful not to get too close.
This monster uses its large ears to detect anything hiding in its surroundings. Flames from its tail let others know not to get too close.
A living being made of coal. The friction from moving causes the coal to ignite which creates the large mane of fire surrounging it.
A spirit that is said to be the embodiment of fire. It contains its energy within the large beads around its neck which can be used to generate all sorts of flames.
With many coals on its back this monster constantly generates heat. It is very popular in hot springs.
An egg shrouded in darkness. Contains a dark type monster.
This monster has a tough personality. It enjoys tackling nearby objects as a show of strength.
Its long ears help it stay aware of its surroundings. This monster is incredibly nervous and does not like to be surprised.
A large monster that loves to eat. It is known to be very selfish and will push smaller monsters out of the way to steal their meals.
This monster will wait patiently for a nearby egg to hatch. It does this so it can steal the shell for its new home, the bigger the shell the better.
A salamander cloaked in darkness. It uses this darkness to help it hide in the shadows.
A spirit of darkness contained in a mysterious crystal. No one knows what will happen if the crystal breaks.
A messenger for other dark monsters. Dark clouds in the sky are often caused by groups of this monster flying together.
A large monster who spends most of its time lazing around. It always seems to dampen the mood somehow.
This monster will spend its entire life asleep, only communicating with its visible dreams. Researchers worry about what would happen if it ever wakes up.
With its large eye it stares out across its domain. Known for its violent tendencies it is best to avoid this monsters gaze.
The object at the end of its lure resembles an item that can be found while journeying. It uses this item to lure unsuspecting travelers to a dark fate.
Often worshipped by cults due to its bizarre appearance. This monster is thought to have come from another dimension.
This monster was once peaceful before being imbued by darkness. This dark energy grants ridiculous strength which can be hard to control.
Known for swindling travellers. This monster waits for gullible people and monsters to sell its faulty wares to.
With sharp claws and a poisonous tail this monster is known for causing trouble. It usually ends up helping out in the community to make up for the messes it causes.
The guardian of dark island. Locals fear that one day it will cause Ragnarok, the end of days.
An egg that has descended from the heavens. Contains a light type monster.
Large groups of this monster keep the skies lighted during night. It always does its best to brighten the mood.
A light monster in training. It hopes to one day become a powerful knight who can protect others.
This monster is proficient in medicine. It spends its life trying to help those in need.
The results of training its entire life are finally starting to show. With wings strong enough to lift itself of the ground it patrols the skys.
An ancient symbol of light. Born from the rarest of metals it reflects the sun in beautiful patterns.
A being of light sealed inside an ancient crystal. Some believe that it used to do battle with an ancient being of darkness before it was sealed.
The amulet on its forehead is a symbol of hope and good fortune. It does its best to brighten the world even though it moves rather slowly.
A benevolent leader of all frog monsters. The croaks it makes are known as a heavenly form of music… to other frogs.
A full fledged knight of light. All of its training has caused it to lost its wings but it is still able to float. It has an oath to protect the weak form darkness.
A dragon that has spent its life collecting treasure. Although it won\'t share its treasure it tries to help others in other ways such as manual labour.
A monster only found on the island of light. Groups can be seen soaring the skies. Despite the somewhat intimidating appearance it loves to give rides to smaller monsters.
The training it has done all its life has caused it to surpass the power of a knight. With its lordly abilities it oversees those in its domain swearing to protect them all.
A centaur who trains young squires who hope to become knights one day. Known for being strict but kind. Their hind legs help them run at incredible speeds.
A being surrounded by a ring of bright light. Thought to be a star it helps to brighten up settlements when the sun goes down.
This butterfly gives off light in different shapes. It can be used to send signals far away depending on what pattern is on its wings.
The amulet on its head was stolen from another monster. Wearing the amulet has changed this monsters nature and it hopes to make up for its past deeds.
An egg that was found among the stars. Contains a cosmic type monster.
A monster made up of bright stardust. Enjoys spending time with others.
A monster made up of dark stardust. Likes to be alone.
Two celestial beings born from the same star. The two are linked together by a mysterious force.

Despite it being dangerous to find one in the wild, the venom from its tail has been used in medicine to treat various sicknesses. Some doctors will spend their entire lives searching for this celestial being.
Researchers call this monster "little dipper". It is said that sailors could use the light it gives off to help them navigate while out at sea.
The music that this monster makes is said to soothe the soul. This monster is very popular at high brow events.
This monster spends its life swimming among the stars with its school. Some people believe that a meteor shower is actually a group of this monster swimming by.
A goat like monster that has been blessed with the ability to swim with its scaled tail. Its two different forms can be seen as a symbol of conflicting desires to live different ways.
An arrow from the heavens that has gained sentience. It floats along with its bow ready to fire at unsuspecting foes.
This monster is known for its incredible softness. Counting a herd of them is said to put you into a blissful slumber.
The meat hidden under its shell is known as a rare delicacy. Due to a life of being over hunted by top chefs around the world it has become rather defensive and distrustful.
The water inside this mysterious pot is actually a part of the monster itself. The water it creates is known for being rich in minerals.
The king among the stars. With its proud stance it watches over the other monsters in its family.
Said to be the most steadfast among the cosmic types. Its loyalty is only matched by its power.
This monsters wings are described as a mythical beauty. Many artists spend their life searching for this monster hoping to find their muse.
The scales it carries are able to measure the kindness in one\'s soul. If it deems someone worthy they may gain passageway to cosmic island.
